PluginListLabel.hidden: Hidden from the quick access menu

PluginCard.plugin_full_access: This plugin has full access to your Steam Deck.

install.desc: Are you sure you want to install {{artifact}} {{version}}?
install.title: Install {{artifact}}

PluginInstallModal.no_hash: This plugin does not have a hash, you are installing it at your own risk.

reinstall.desc: Are you sure you want to reinstall {{artifact}} {{version}}?
reinstall.title: Reinstall {{artifact}}

update.desc: Are you sure you want to update {{artifact}} {{version}}?
update.title: Update {{artifact}}

MultiplePluginsInstallModal.confirm: Are you sure you want to make the following modifications?

PluginLoader.plugin_error_uninstall: Loading {{name}} caused an exception as shown above. This usually means that the plugin requires an update for the new version of SteamUI. Check if an update is present or evaluate its removal in the Decky settings, in the Plugins section.

plugin_uninstall.desc: Are you sure you want to uninstall {{name}}?
plugin_uninstall.title: Uninstall {{name}}

remote_cef.desc: Allow unauthenticated access to the CEF debugger to anyone in your network
remote_cef.label: Allow Remote CEF Debugging

cef_console.desc: Opens the CEF Console. Only useful for debugging purposes. Stuff here is potentially dangerous and should only be used if you are a plugin dev, or are directed here by one.
cef_console.label: CEF Console

react_devtools.desc: Enables connection to a computer running React DevTools. Changing this setting will reload Steam. Set the IP address before enabling.
react_devtools.label: Enable React DevTools

toast_zip.body: Installation failed! Only ZIP files are supported.
toast_zip.title: Decky

valve_internal.desc1: Enables the Valve internal developer menu.
valve_internal.desc2: Do not touch anything in this menu unless you know what it does.
valve_internal.label: Enable Valve Internal

store_contrib.desc: If you would like to contribute to the Decky Plugin Store, check the SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-plugin-template repository on GitHub. Information on development and distribution is available in the README.
store_contrib.label: Contributing

store_source.desc: All plugin source code is available on SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-plugin-database repository on GitHub.
store_source.label: Source Code

Store.store_testing_cta: Please consider testing new plugins to help the Decky Loader team!

Updater.no_patch_notes_desc: no patch notes for this version
